scripts.test:backend: bun run test:backend:core && bun run test:backend:mediator
scripts.dev:desktop:vue: cd desktop && FRONTEND_SHELL=vue bun run dev
scripts.dev:desktop:react: cd desktop && FRONTEND_SHELL=react bun run dev
scripts.build:desktop:vue: bun run build:web:vue-elysia && cd desktop && FRONTEND_SHELL=vue bun run scripts/build-dispatch.ts
scripts.build:desktop:react: bun run build:web:react-elysia && cd desktop && FRONTEND_SHELL=react bun run scripts/build-dispatch.ts
scripts.uninstall:all: rm -rf node_modules backend/node_modules backend/packages/*/node_modules frontend/node_modules frontend/packages/*/node_modules desktop/node_modules shared/node_modules pnpm-lock.yaml bun.lock
scripts.dev:web:vue-koa: concurrently -n frontend,backend -c blue,green "bun run dev:frontend:vue" "pnpm run dev:backend:koa"
scripts.dev:web:react-koa: concurrently -n frontend,backend -c blue,green "bun run dev:frontend:react" "pnpm run dev:backend:koa"
